Hero.heading: Meet Agent-Space
Hero.heading2: Agent Space allows Travlor agents to discover price gaps between Travelor and Booking, earning high commissions.
Hero.heading3: With our new tools, gain in unprecedented ways.
Hero.createAccountDescription: Create an account for FREE and use all our tools to start gaining with the help of all our special features

WhoWeAre.title: Who We Are
WhoWeAre.paragraph1: Agent Space is an initiative aimed at assisting travel agents in maximizing revenue through innovative tools. These tools enable agents to efficiently locate hotels offering the best prices for travelers and effectively market them to clients. Additionally, new features help agents further reduce prices and rapidly promote their personal links.

comparePrices.title: Compare Prices
comparePrices.description: Compare prices between Booking and Travelor, anywhere, anytime.

copyHotelDetail.title: Copy Hotel Details
copyHotelDetail.description: Copy the desired hotel details in one click and share them on social media.

shortenLink.title: Shorten Hotel Links
shortenLink.description: Shorten the link in one click with our built-in system and copy it with the hotel details.

findAttractions.title: Find Attractions
findAttractions.description: Find the most popular tourist destinations in a city in just one click.

searchProxy.title: Search Proxy
searchProxy.description: Search for deals through different locations in the world and lower the price.

sessionPrice.title: Session Price Lowering
sessionPrice.description: Lower the price on the Travlor website by using our tool to opt for Travelor in a new session.

Integration.title: Integration
Integration.description1: All the website features work together with full integration to allow each agent to be the most effective they can be. You no longer need to use external services to shorten your links or to copy the hotel details one by one. All our features work together to allow you to find deals and publish them in the most effective way.

FiveMin.title: 5 minutes per day
FiveMin.description2: Here is what you can do in 5 minutes per day:
FiveMin.task3: 3. Search for cheap hotels in this location
FiveMin.task4: 4. Find hotels with the biggest advantage for Travelor
FiveMin.task5: 5. Create a custom short link for each one of the hotels
FiveMin.task6: 6. Copy the Hotel Details, with the link, in ONE CLICK
FiveMin.task7: 7. Share 10 hotels with the best prices on social media
